article.headline: UNLV 96, San Francisco 88
article.story: LAS VEGAS (AP) -- UNLV's Kevin Kruger had 16 points and a game-high nine assists and Michael Umeh added 20 points in the Rebels' 96-88 victory over San Francisco Saturday night. The Rebels (4-1) had four scorers reach double figures, including Wendell White with 19 points and a game-high seven rebounds and Wink Adams with 17. UNLV opened the game on a 19-6 run before San Francisco scored 12 of the next 15 points in cutting its deficit to 21-18 with 6:12 to play in the first half. But Adams and Kruger combined for the next eight points and the Rebels extended their lead to double digits. Manny Quezada had a career-high 25 points and five assists for San Francisco (2-3), but the Dons missed nine of their first 10 shots in dropping their third straight game. Antonio Kellogg added 17 points, Alan Wiggins had 13 and Armondo Surratt tallied 12.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
